data.name: Bill Paying account
data.description: A bank account that makes it easy to separate your money for bills.

features.additionalValue: Track payments with SMS and email alerts

features.additionalInfo: Our sweep service automatically transfers funds from certain savings accounts to cover most transactions which would otherwiese exceed your transasction account's available balance.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to current or retired employees of the Australian education sector or family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Bank.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.

fees.name: ELECTRONIC_FUNDS_TRANSFER_-_STAFF_ASSISTED
fees.additionalInfo: Electronic funds transfer via Staff assisted

fees.name: PERIODICAL_PAYMENTS_-_STAFF_ASSISTED
fees.additionalInfo: Set up and alterations via Staff assisted

fees.name: DEPOSIT_OF_DISHONOURED_CHEQUE
fees.additionalInfo: When you deposit a domestic cheque which is later advised to have been dishourned by the drawer's bank. Domestic cheque.

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: PAYMENTS_DISHONOUR
fees.additionalInfo: There will be 5 attempts to meet requested transfers and payments (includes future dated BPAYs, Osko and all third party payments). The fee applies only to the 3rd, 4th and 5th unsuccessful attempts on recurring payments and cancelled on the 5th unsuccessful attempt.

fees.name: OVERDRAWN_ACCOUNT
fees.additionalInfo: The fee is debited on the day the account is overdrawn or a withdrawal is made to further overdraw the account. Interest will also be charged on the amount overdrawn at the overdraft (RediCredit) interest rate, calculated for each day that the account is overdrawn and debited at the end of the month.

fees.name: CHEQUE_DISHONOUR
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when there are insufficient funds to meet your cheque and it has been returned unpaid.

fees.name: ELECTRONIC_DEPOSIT_DISHONOUR
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the electronic deposit direct debit request is returned unpaid by the other financial institution.

fees.name: CHEQUE_BOOKS
fees.additionalInfo: Book of 25

fees.name: ENCASHMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when your cheque is cashed at a National Australia Bank (NAB) branch and paid to NAB at the time of withdrawal.

fees.name: CHEQUE_TRACE
fees.additionalInfo: For a trace on who received the funds.

fees.name: BANK_CHEQUE
fees.additionalInfo: Issue fee for each cheque drawn.

fees.name: SPECIAL_CLEARANCE_FOR_CHEQUE_DEPOSITS
fees.additionalInfo: Special clearence for cheque deposits (approximatley 48 hrs)

fees.name: BANK_CHEQUE_NAB
fees.additionalInfo: Issue (NAB charge is $12)

fees.name: TELE_TRANSFER_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Transfers within Australia to an account at another financial institution. Fees may also be applied by receiving institutions and these charges may be deducted from amount being transferred.  At cost per receiving bank.

fees.name: TELE_TRANSFER_PROCESSING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: At Cost - Cuscal fee for processing payments and receipts of real time irrevocable cleared funds.

fees.name: BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Account establishment fee for non-individual members; and individual and non-individual customers.

fees.name: BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY_ACCOUNT_KEEPING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Monthly account keeping fee charged on the 25th of each month for non-individual members; and individual and non-individual customers.

fees.name: BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_COIN_DEPOSITS
fees.additionalInfo: 2% of value.

fees.name: COURIER_FEES_NATIONAL
fees.additionalInfo: National

fees.name: COURIER_FEES_INTERNATIONAL
fees.additionalInfo: International

fees.name: STATEMENTS-REPLACEMENT_AND_ADDITIONAL_STATEMENTS
fees.additionalInfo: Replacement and additional statements

fees.name: STATEMENTS-TRANSACTIONAL_LISTINGS_FOR_CURRENT_MONTH
fees.additionalInfo: Transactional listings for current month (on request or sent more frequently than monthly)

fees.name: DOCUMENT_COPIES
fees.additionalInfo: $25 per copy or $50 per hour (minimum charge $25). Copy of cheque or deposit, recently presented cheque and/or deposit and any copy of any other document/archival search.

fees.name: INACTIVE_CLIENT_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: An annual charge to maintain an account where there has been no transaction for 12 months and we have been unable to contact you.

fees.name: TELEGRAPHIC_TRANSFER_TRACE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: At cost - Cuscal fee for processing payments and receipts of real time irrevocable cleared funds.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $50 per hour (minimum charge $25). Additional accounting services on your account at your request.

fees.name: SECURITY_TOKEN_REPLACEMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for a security token that is lost, stolen or damaged.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The overdraft (RediCredit) interest rate that applies to any overdrawn amounts.
